primarySpeaker.bio:
Born into an USAF family in Lubbock, TX in 1983.  
Saved and baptized at Rheinland Baptist Church in Landstuhl, Germany in 1990.  
Called to preach at youth camp in the summer of 1998.  
Graduated from Gospel Light Baptist Academy in 2002.
Graduated w/ honors from Colorado Baptist College in 2006. 
Married in May 2006; have one son and one daughter.  

Founding pastor of Providence Baptist Church in Georgetown, Texas.  (11/2015-present)
Previously, Assistant Pastor at Gospel Light Baptist Church in Rio Rancho, New Mexico.  (06/2006-06/2015)
